Pagrus was an adventurer and a member of Maulers of Undermountain that ventured on the Sword Coast during the midâ€“14 century DR.
He wore a pair of Bracers of defense, wielded a +1 longsword, and carried on him a number of spell scrolls, including those of lightning bolt, melfs acid arrow, and larlochs minor drain, among others.
At some point in the , Pargus and the Maulers were staying at the Helm and Cloak inn found in the city of Baldurs Gate.
